00020 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_ARGUMENT_CASTER_HPP
00021 #define CLPP_DETAIL_ARGUMENT_CASTER_HPP
00022 
00023 #include "misc.hpp"
00024 
00025 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00026 
00029 namespace clpp {
00030 
00033 namespace detail {
00034 
00037 struct argument_caster {
00038 public:
00039     void call_func_with_inputed_arg( const any& arg
00040                                      , const std::string& name
00041                                      , const std::string& value ) const {
00042         if      ( argument_must_be_bool( arg ) )               { call_with_bool_arg(               arg, name, value ); }
00043         else if ( argument_must_be_char( arg ) )               { call_with_char_arg(               arg, name, value ); }
00044         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_char( arg ) )        { call_with_signed_char_arg(        arg, name, value ); }
00045         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_char( arg ) )      { call_with_unsigned_char_arg(      arg, name, value ); }
00046         else if ( argument_must_be_int( arg ) )                { call_with_int_arg(                arg, name, value ); }
00047         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_int( arg ) )         { call_with_signed_int_arg(         arg, name, value ); }
00048         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_int( arg ) )       { call_with_unsigned_int_arg(       arg, name, value ); }
00049         else if ( argument_must_be_short_int( arg ) )          { call_with_short_int_arg(          arg, name, value ); }
00050         else if ( argument_must_be_long_int( arg ) )           { call_with_long_int_arg(           arg, name, value ); }
00051         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_long_int( arg ) )  { call_with_unsigned_long_int_arg(  arg, name, value ); }
00052         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_short_int( arg ) ) { call_with_unsigned_short_int_arg( arg, name, value ); }
00053         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_long_int( arg ) )    { call_with_signed_long_int_arg(    arg, name, value ); }
00054         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_short_int( arg ) )   { call_with_signed_short_int_arg(   arg, name, value ); } 
00055         else if ( argument_must_be_float( arg ) )              { call_with_float_arg(              arg, name, value ); }
00056         else if ( argument_must_be_double( arg ) )             { call_with_double_arg(             arg, name, value ); }
00057         else if ( argument_must_be_long_double( arg ) )        { call_with_long_double_arg(        arg, name, value ); }
00058         else if ( argument_must_be_string( arg ) )             { call_with_string_arg(             arg, name, value ); }
00059         else {
00060             notify_about_unsupported_type( name );
00061         }        
00062     }
00063 
00064     void call_func_with_default_arg( const any& arg ) const {
00065         if      ( argument_must_be_bool( arg ) )                { call_with_bool_arg(               arg ); }
00066         else if ( argument_must_be_char( arg ) )                { call_with_char_arg(               arg ); }
00067         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_char( arg ) )         { call_with_signed_char_arg(        arg ); }
00068         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_char( arg ) )       { call_with_unsigned_char_arg(      arg ); }
00069         else if ( argument_must_be_int( arg ) )                 { call_with_int_arg(                arg ); }
00070         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_int( arg ) )          { call_with_signed_int_arg(         arg ); }
00071         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_int( arg ) )        { call_with_unsigned_int_arg(       arg ); }
00072         else if ( argument_must_be_short_int( arg ) )           { call_with_short_int_arg(          arg ); }
00073         else if ( argument_must_be_long_int( arg ) )            { call_with_long_int_arg(           arg ); }
00074         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_long_int( arg ) )   { call_with_unsigned_long_int_arg(  arg ); }
00075         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_short_int( arg ) )  { call_with_unsigned_short_int_arg( arg ); }
00076         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_long_int( arg ) )     { call_with_signed_long_int_arg(    arg ); }
00077         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_short_int( arg ) )    { call_with_signed_short_int_arg(   arg ); } 
00078         else if ( argument_must_be_float( arg ) )               { call_with_float_arg(              arg ); }
00079         else if ( argument_must_be_double( arg ) )              { call_with_double_arg(             arg ); }
00080         else if ( argument_must_be_long_double( arg ) )         { call_with_long_double_arg(        arg ); }
00081         else if ( argument_must_be_string( arg ) )              { call_with_string_arg(             arg ); }
00082     }
00083 
00084     void store_default_value( const any& arg
00085                               , const any& value
00086                               , const std::string& name ) const {
00087         if      ( argument_must_be_bool( arg ) )               { store_bool_value(               arg, value, name ); }
00088         else if ( argument_must_be_char( arg ) )               { store_char_value(               arg, value, name ); }
00089         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_char( arg ) )        { store_signed_char_value(        arg, value, name ); }
00090         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_char( arg ) )      { store_unsigned_char_value(      arg, value, name ); }
00091         else if ( argument_must_be_int( arg ) )                { store_int_value(                arg, value, name ); }
00092         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_int( arg ) )         { store_signed_int_value(         arg, value, name ); }
00093         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_int( arg ) )       { store_unsigned_int_value(       arg, value, name ); }
00094         else if ( argument_must_be_short_int( arg ) )          { store_short_int_value(          arg, value, name ); }
00095         else if ( argument_must_be_long_int( arg ) )           { store_long_int_value(           arg, value, name ); }
00096         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_long_int( arg ) )  { store_unsigned_long_int_value(  arg, value, name ); }
00097         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_short_int( arg ) ) { store_unsigned_short_int_value( arg, value, name ); }
00098         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_long_int( arg ) )    { store_signed_long_int_value(    arg, value, name ); }
00099         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_short_int( arg ) )   { store_signed_short_int_value(   arg, value, name ); } 
00100         else if ( argument_must_be_float( arg ) )              { store_float_value(              arg, value, name ); }
00101         else if ( argument_must_be_double( arg ) )             { store_double_value(             arg, value, name ); }
00102         else if ( argument_must_be_long_double( arg ) )        { store_long_double_value(        arg, value, name ); }
00103         else if ( argument_must_be_string( arg ) )             { store_string_value(             arg, value, name ); }
00104         else {
00105             notify_about_unsupported_type( name );
00106         } 
00107     }
00108 private:
00109     bool argument_must_be_bool( const any& arg ) const                  { return typeid( b_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00110     bool argument_must_be_char( const any& arg ) const                  { return typeid( c_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00111     bool argument_must_be_signed_char( const any& arg ) const           { return typeid( sc_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00112     bool argument_must_be_unsigned_char( const any& arg ) const         { return typeid( uc_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00113     bool argument_must_be_int( const any& arg ) const                   { return typeid( i_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00114     bool argument_must_be_signed_int( const any& arg ) const            { return typeid( si_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00115     bool argument_must_be_unsigned_int( const any& arg ) const          { return typeid( ui_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00116     bool argument_must_be_short_int( const any& arg ) const             { return typeid( shi_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00117     bool argument_must_be_long_int( const any& arg ) const              { return typeid( li_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00118     bool argument_must_be_unsigned_long_int( const any& arg ) const     { return typeid( uli_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00119     bool argument_must_be_unsigned_short_int( const any& arg ) const    { return typeid( ushi_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00120     bool argument_must_be_signed_long_int( const any& arg ) const       { return typeid( sli_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00121     bool argument_must_be_signed_short_int( const any& arg ) const      { return typeid( sshi_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00122     bool argument_must_be_float( const any& arg ) const                 { return typeid( f_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00123     bool argument_must_be_double( const any& arg ) const                { return typeid( d_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00124     bool argument_must_be_long_double( const any& arg ) const           { return typeid( ld_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00125 public:    
00126     bool argument_must_be_string( const any& arg ) const                { return typeid( s_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00127 private:
00128     void call_with_bool_arg( 
00129             const any& arg, const std::string& name, const std::string& value ) const {
00130         b_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< b_arg_p >( arg ); 
00131         call< bool >( value, name, p );
00132     }
00133        
00134     void call_with_char_arg( 
00135             const any& arg, const std::string& name, const std::string& value ) const {
00136         c_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< c_arg_p >( arg );
00137         call< char >( value, name, p );
00138     }
00139 
00140     void call_with_signed_char_arg( 
00141             const any& arg, const std::string& name, const std::string& value ) const {
00142         sc_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< sc_arg_p >( arg );
00143         call< signed char >( value, name, p );
00144     }

00147             const any& arg, const std::string& name, const std::string& value ) const {
00148         uc_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< uc_arg_p >( arg );

00150     }

00224     void call_with_string_arg( 
00225             const any& arg, const std::string& name, const std::string& value ) const {
00226         s_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< s_arg_p >( arg );
00227         call< std::string >( value, name, p );
00228     }
00229 private:
00230     template
00231     <
00232         typename ArgType
00233         , typename ArgHolderType
00234     >
00235     void call( const std::string&    inputed_value
00236                , const std::string&  parameter_name
00237                , ArgHolderType&      holder ) const {
00238         ArgType argument;
00239         try {
00240             argument = boost::lexical_cast< ArgType >( inputed_value );
00241         } catch ( const std::exception& /* exc */ ) {
00242             notify_about_error_type< ArgType >( parameter_name );
00243         }
00244         holder->func_with_arg( argument );
00245     }
00246 private:
00247     void call_with_bool_arg( const any& arg ) const {
00248         b_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< b_arg_p >( arg ); 
00249         p->func_with_arg( p->default_value );
00250     }
00251      
00252     void call_with_char_arg( const any& arg ) const {
00253         c_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< c_arg_p >( arg );
00254         p->func_with_arg( p->default_value );
00255     }
00256 
00257     void call_with_signed_char_arg( const any& arg ) const {
00258         sc_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< sc_arg_p >( arg );
00259         p->func_with_arg( p->default_value );
00260     }

00331 private:
00332     void store_bool_value( const any& arg
00333                            , const any& inputed_value
00334                            , const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00335         b_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< b_arg_p >( arg );
00336         store< bool >( inputed_value, p, parameter_name );
00337     }
00338

00340                            , const any& inputed_value

00437     void store_long_double_value( const any& arg
00438                                   , const any& inputed_value
00439                                   , const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00440         ld_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< ld_arg_p >( arg );
00441         store< long double >( inputed_value, p, parameter_name );
00442     }
00443 
00444     void store_string_value( const any& arg
00445                              , const any& inputed_value
00446                              , const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00447         s_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< s_arg_p >( arg );
00448         store< std::string >( inputed_value, p, parameter_name );
00449     }
00450 private:
00451     template
00452     < 
00453         typename ArgType
00454         , typename ArgHolderType
00455     >
00456     void store( const any& inputed_value, ArgHolderType& holder, const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00457         if ( typeid( ArgType ) == inputed_value.type() ) {
00458             holder->default_value = boost::any_cast< ArgType >( inputed_value );
00459         } else {
00460             notify_about_error_type_of_default_value< ArgType >( parameter_name );
00461         }
00462     }
00463 private:
00464     template< typename ArgType >
00465     void notify_about_error_type( const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00466         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00467                                           + "Value's type for parameter '" + parameter_name 
00468                                           + "' must be <" + get_type_identifier< ArgType >() + ">!"
00469                                           ;
00470         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00471     }
00472 
00473     template< typename ArgType >
00474     void notify_about_error_type_of_default_value( const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00475         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00476                                           + "Default value's type for parameter '" + parameter_name 
00477                                           + "' must be <" + get_type_identifier< ArgType >() + ">!"
00478                                           ;
00479         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened ); 
00480     }
00481 
00482     template< typename ArgType >
00483     std::string get_type_identifier() const {
00484         std::string identifier;
00485         
00486         if      ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( bool ) )                { identifier = "bool"; }
00487         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( char ) )                { identifier = "char"; }
00488         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( signed char ) )         { identifier = "signed char"; }
00489         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( unsigned char ) )       { identifier = "unsigned char"; }
00490         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( int ) )                 { identifier = "int"; }
00491         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( signed int ) )          { identifier = "signed int"; }
00492         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( unsigned int ) )        { identifier = "unsigned int"; }
00493         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( short int ) )           { identifier = "short int"; }
00494         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( long int ) )            { identifier = "long int"; }
00495         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( unsigned long int ) )   { identifier = "unsigned long int"; }
00496         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( unsigned short int ) )  { identifier = "unsigned short int"; }
00497         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( signed long int ) )     { identifier = "signed long int"; }
00498         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( signed short int ) )    { identifier = "signed short int"; }
00499         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( float ) )               { identifier = "float"; }
00500         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( double ) )              { identifier = "double"; }
00501         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( long double ) )         { identifier = "long double"; }
00502         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( std::string ) )         { identifier = "std::string"; }
00503 
00504         return identifier;
00505     }
00506 
00507     void notify_about_unsupported_type( const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00508         const std::string what_happened = "Parameter '" 
00509                                           + parameter_name 
00510                                           + "' registered with function having argument's unsupported type!";
00511         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00512     }
00513 };
00514 
00515 } // namespace detail
00516 } // namespace clpp
00517 
00518 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_ARGUMENT_CASTER_HPP
